data.comment: The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Internacional.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick Internacional.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 11, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 14, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Internacional drive upfield and Patrick gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Martin Sarrafiore (Internacional) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Gabriel Menino, who is grimacing with pain.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 23, Gabriel Menino returns to the field for Palmeiras after picking up a slight injury.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Rodrigo Moledo (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Ze Rafael is booked for the home team.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 30, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 33, Palmeiras's Matias Vina breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 39, Luan Garcia (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nonato.
In the minute 43, Internacional’s Nonato is on his feet again at Allianz Parque.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In Sao Paulo Internacional attack through Moises. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Praxedes (Internacional) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 45, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Internacional.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Palmeiras defence as Martin Sarrafiore fires in a strike for Internacional.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Praxedes for Internacional has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
The second half has started at Allianz Parque.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 46, Rony is on a sub for Gabriel Menino for Palmeiras.
The away team have replaced Praxedes with Edenilson. This is the first substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
In the minute 47, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ze Rafael (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Palmeiras's Rony gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcelo Lomba for Internacional who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Internacional's Marcelo Lomba is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Internacional, close to Palmeiras's area.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gabriel Boschilia is replacing Patrick for Internacional at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 59, Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) is making a third substitution, with Thiago Galhardo replacing Marcos Guilherme.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Gustavo Gomez for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, Internacional have a goal kick.
In Sao Paulo, Martin Sarrafiore of Internacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Vanderlei Luxemburgo is making the team's second substitution at Allianz Parque with Ramires replacing Ze Rafael.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Rony (Palmeiras) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 63, Internacional needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Internacional's Nonato has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Attention is being given to Palmeiras’s Mayke and play has been suspended briefly.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
The home team replace Lucas Lima with Willian.
In the minute 70, Palmeiras make their fourth substitution with Diogo Barbosa replacing Matias Vina.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 71, Palmeiras's Mayke looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Sao Paulo Internacional drive forward through Gabriel Boschilia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Internacional's half.
Thiago Galhardo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Palmeiras push forward at Allianz Parque and Rony gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Rodinei for Internacional is still down.
In the minute 77, Thiago Galhardo has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
Rodinei is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Internacional at Allianz Parque.
The away team have replaced Johnny with Jussa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 78, At Allianz Parque, Victor Cuesta has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 80, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras just outside Internacional's area.
Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Internacional at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 81, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
Jussa (Internacional) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Andres D'Alessandro is replacing Nonato for Internacional at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 85, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Internacional at Allianz Parque.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Internacional's area.
Palmeiras drive forward but Rony is judged offside.
Internacional have been awarded a penalty in Sao Paulo...
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Sao Paulo.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Goal! Thiago Galhardo gives Internacional a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Gustavo Gomez with an assist there.
Wesley is replacing Bruno Henrique for the home team.
